bdv.cache

Interface CacheControl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheControl.CacheControls, CacheControl.Dummy, SharedQueue, VolatileGlobalCellCache

    public interface CacheControl
    This is the part of the VolatileGlobalCellCache interface that is exposed to the renderer directly (that is, not via images). It comprises methods to control cache behavior. If the renderer is used without VolatileGlobalCellCache, these can be simply implemented to do nothing.
    Author:
    Tobias Pietzsch

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CacheControl.CacheControls
      CacheControl backed by a set of CacheControls.
      static class  CacheControl.Dummy
      CacheControl that does nothing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void prepareNextFrame()
      Prepare the cache for providing data for the "next frame".

    • Method Detail

      • prepareNextFrame

        void prepareNextFrame()
        Prepare the cache for providing data for the "next frame".

        For the VolatileGlobalCellCache, this means that

        • the contents of fetch queues is moved to the prefetch. and
        • the internal frame counter is incremented, which will enable previously enqueued requests to be enqueued again for the new frame.
